definition: as they say, .../as the saying goes, ...
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
is/are/am/yes/to be

sentences.english: They say even the proudest spirit can be broken with love.
sentences.chinese: 有道是最驕傲的靈魂也會爲愛所傷。

sentences.english: I don't think so. Can the leopard change its spots?
sentences.chinese: 我不這樣認爲，有道是江山易改，本性難移啊。

sentences.english: There asayingsays that man has sufferings most and will die into earth in end.
sentences.chinese: 有道是人世萬苦人最苦，終不悔九死落灰塵。

sentences.english: The thing about new beginnings is that they require something else to end .
sentences.chinese: 有道是新的開始需要舊的故事來了結。

definition: as the proverb says/as they say...
common saying/proverb
common saying
ancient language/old expression
common saying/proverb/colloquial speech
ancient proverb/old saying
old adage/ancient teaching
wise saying/words of wisdom
Only an outstanding talent can recognize current trends (idiom). A wise man submits to circumstances.
pinyin: shi2 shi2 wu4 zhe3 wei4 jun4 jie2

definition: lit. it is not an official to be feared, but a person in direct control over sb (proverb)/fig. to be obliged to comply with people in authority
pinyin: bu4 pa4 guan1 , zhi3 pa4 guan3

definition: how? (emphatic question)
old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]
lit. strong dragon cannot repress a snake (idiom); fig. a local gangster who is above the law
pinyin: qiang2 long2 bu4 ya1 di4 tou2 she2

definition: lit. the dog that bites does not show its fangs (idiom)/fig. You can't tell the really dangerous enemy from his external appearance.
pinyin: yao3 ren2 gou3 'r bu4 lu4 chi3

definition: lit. human beings will die for riches, just as birds will for food (idiom)/fig. man will do anything in his means to become rich
pinyin: ren2 wei4 cai2 si3 , niao3 wei4 shi2 wang2

definition: in my opinion
lit. easy to dodge the spear in the open, hard to avoid a stab in the dark (idiom); it is hard to guard against secret conspiracies
pinyin: ming2 qiang1 yi4 duo3 , an4 jian4 nan2 fang2
